CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TEXT(Unit_of_Weight__c) == "GR", Net_Weight__c >= 10), Net_Weight__c / 1000, IF(AND(TEXT(Unit_of_Weight__c) == "LB", Net_Weight__c >= 0.1), Net_Weight__c / 2.205, IF(AND(TEXT(Unit_of_Weight__c) == "MG", Net_Weight__c >= 10000), Net_Weight__c / 1000000, Net_Weight__c)) )
CustomField.label: Net Weight (kg)
